<?php
/**

 * The wp-config.php creation script uses this file during the
 * installation. You don't have to use the web site, you can

 * This file contains the following configurations:
 *
 * * MySQL settings
 * * Secret keys
 * * Database table prefix
 * * ABSPATH
 *
 * @link https://codex.wordpress.org/Editing_wp-config.php
 *
 * @package WordPress
 */

<?php
/**
 * The base configuration for WordPress
 *
 * The wp-config.php creation script uses this file during the
 * installation. You don't have to use the web site, you can
 * copy this file to "wp-config.php" and fill in the values.
 *
 * This file contains the following configurations:
 *
 * * MySQL settings
 * * Secret keys
 * * Database table prefix
 * * ABSPATH
 *
 * @link https://codex.wordpress.org/Editing_wp-config.php
 *
 * @package WordPress
 */

// ** MySQL settings - You can get this info from your web host ** //
/** The name of the database for WordPress */
define( 'DB_NAME', 'nsfwp_online' );

/** MySQL database username */
define( 'DB_USER', 'nsfwp_online' );

/** MySQL database password */
define( 'DB_PASSWORD', 'cvqjORibPXYmxax9kziTK0I4O' );

/** MySQL hostname */
define( 'DB_HOST', 'localhost' );

/** Database Charset to use in creating database tables. */

/** The Database Collate type. Don't change this if in doubt. */
define( 'DB_COLLATE', '' );

/**
 * Authentication Unique Keys and Salts.
 *
 * Change these to different unique phrases!
 * You can generate these using the {@link https://api.wordpress.org/secret-key/1.1/salt/ WordPress.org secret-key service}
 * You can change these at any point in time to invalidate all existing cookies. This will force all users to have to log in again.
 *

 */

define( 'LOGGED_IN_KEY',     'f^Sy20 p[hYTP+1ggQQ=J)MS~zfOh,8spkJO5-xtzA6mVZF*rFi<zN8]/SR*onke' );
define( 'NONCE_KEY',         '9Qg~-~enU:Dv &AkijQTtaTlw,x70Ku!fC+.w:8(,6/d=_L#hu3;EV9hpExLTpg%' );
define( 'AUTH_SALT',         'JI7.1aN3t{]_wOx34I232.c[P(S%/W*tz{{;a6Ws:IZhQ^&`;aWLJFO(Mly6L%,c' );
define( 'SECURE_AUTH_SALT',  '/oQ;:};kb*~U-WR~B2m^]Z% sbN^9oarG7-mV8_[;x*h&9OiWc?s gdSZe^lwUo$' );
define( 'LOGGED_IN_SALT',    'Cc3R1aEQdhJbBCM`1|LFLAsVJlz@p+xxjkP2>Is}Q,K)pBbyGt1</}|wpfb-ylCh' );
define( 'NONCE_SALT',        'f+sRPv/Tqk(1w(Dlb9CJo`R2itq1-QPeGLV2PE)WK2j8~yC%fZ=vVB#?Q.9Lk9zo' );

/**
 * WordPress Database Table prefix.

 * You can have multiple installations in one database if you give each
 * a unique prefix. Only numbers, letters, and underscores please!

$table_prefix = 'wp_';


/* GridPane site routing */

/* GridPane Secure Debug */

}

require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-settings.php';
